events.message: I recently received my order but I want to return it because the product does not meet my expectations. How do I proceed with a refund?
The request is classified as a refund case based on the customer's inquiry about returning the product and getting money back.
The case has been assigned to a customer service representative specialized in refunds for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund request quickly, I need the reason for the return and whether the product is unopened or used.
The order number is 123456789. I want a refund because the item isn’t what I expected. It’s unopened and still in the original packaging.
Thank you for the details. You are eligible for a full refund. Please send the unopened product back to our returns address using the prepaid shipping label I will email you shortly.
That sounds good to me. I appreciate the quick response and will ship the product as you instructed.
Your return shipment has been received and your refund has been processed. You should see the money back on your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund was received without any issues. Please let us know if there’s anything else we can help you with.
Since the refund process is completed and you did not report any further issues, we will now close this case. Thank you for contacting us.
We have sent you a short survey to let us know how satisfied you were with the refund experience. Your feedback is valuable to us.
